content.new:
Hey,

I am trying to load a `dae` mesh in gazebo with attached animation frames to it.
I use blender to export my mesh & animations into the collada format
to input into Gazebo.

If I do not attach any skeleton to the model, Gazebo loads it up fine

issue.title: Collada loader failing at loading Blender exported dae rigged model with motion tracking animation attached to it.
